CLAN.gui.confirm.transfer.click.no.money.de-DE: <i:false>[red]Du hast [red]nicht</color> genug [gem_purple]Gems</color> um deinen [blue]Clan</color> an jemand anderen zu übertragen!</color>
CLAN.gui.confirm.transfer.click.no.money.en-US: <i:false>[red]You do [red]not</color> have enough [gem_purple]Gems</color> to transfer your [blue]Clan</color> to someone else!</color>

CLAN.gui.confirm.transfer.click.success.en-US: [grey]You have successfully transferred the clan [blue][name]#[tagline]</color> ([blue][id]</color>) to [blue][player]!</color></color>

CLAN.gui.confirm.transfer.click.success..de-DE: [grey][blue][player]</color> hat den Clan [blue][name]#[tagline]</color> ([blue][id]</color>) an dich übertragen!</color>
CLAN.gui.confirm.transfer.click.success..en-US: [grey][blue][player]</color> has transferred the clan [blue][name]#[tagline]</color> ([blue][id]</color>) to you!</color></color>
